name: Generate Weekly Meta Ads Report with GPT-4 Insights and Slack Delivery
description:
## What this workflow does
- Runs automatically every Monday morning at 8 AM
- Collects your Meta Ads data from the last 7 days for a given account (date range is configurable)
- Formats the data, aggregating it at the campaign, ad set, and ad levels
- Generates AI-driven analysis and insights on your results, providing actionable recommendations
- Renders the report as a visually appealing PDF with charts and tables
- Sends the report via Slack (you can also add email or WhatsApp)

**A sample for the first page of the report:**
![image.png](fileId:1590)

## Setup Guide
- [Create an account of pdforge](https://app.pdforge.com/auth/sign-up) and use the pre-made Meta Ads template.
- Connect Meta Ads, OpenAI and Slack to n8n
- Set your Ad Account Id and date range (choose from 'last_7d', 'last_14d', 'last30d')
- *(opcional)* Customize the scheduling date and time


## Requirements
- Meta Ads (via Facebook Graph API): [Documentation](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/facebookgraph/)
- pdforge access: [Integration guide](https://pdforge.com/blog/how-to-automate-pdf-generation-with-n8n-and-pdforge)
- AI API access (e.g. via OpenAI, Anthropic, Google or Ollama)
- Slack acces (via OAuth2): [Documentation](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/slack)


Feel free to [contact me via Linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/marceloamiranda/), if you have any questions! üëãüèª

workflow.name: AI-Powered Meta Ads Weekly PDF Report ‚Äì  Sends to your Slack or Email

parameters.content:
## Welcome to Weekly Meta Ads Report Workflow!

**This workflow has the following sequence:**
1. Time trigger (e.g. every Monday at 8 a.m.)
2. Retrieval of Meta Ads data from the last 7 days (or any period you want)
3. Format it and generate AI insight of the data
4. Transform it into a PDF report using pdforge (Using the pre-made Meta Ads Template)
5. Sending the report as a Slack Message (You can change it to send an e-mail, whatsapp or telegram message)


**The following accesses are required for the workflow:**
- Meta Ads (via Facebook Graph API): [Documentation](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/facebookgraph/)
- pdforge account: [Create here](https://app.pdforge.com/auth/sign-up)
- AI API access (e.g. via OpenAI, Anthropic, Google or Ollama)
- Slack Connection: [Documentation](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/slack)


You can contact me via LinkedIn, if you have any questions: https://www.linkedin.com/in/marceloamiranda

**Here you'll configure:**
- AD Account ID
- Date range from ads

options.systemMessage:
=## Persona
You are a data-driven Meta Ads Insights Agent: concise, analytical, and focused on turning raw campaign data into clear, actionable recommendations.

## Objective
- Ingest structured Meta Ads data (campaigns ‚Üí adsets ‚Üí ads).  
- Generate three tiers of performance insights: campaign, adset, ad.  
- Keep each insight 200‚Äì300 characters, in English, ending with a practical tip.

## Rules
### Formatting
- Output **only** a JSON object with keys: `campaign_insights`, `adset_insights`, `ad_insights`.  
- Do **not** include any additional text or explanation.  
- Ensure each insight string is between **200 and 300 characters** (inclusive).

### Content
- All insights must be written in clear, idiomatic English.  
- Each insight must:
  1. Summarize performance (e.g., spend vs. CTR/CPC comparisons).  
  2. Highlight one key strength or weakness.  
  3. Conclude with a single, concrete, actionable tip.

### Constraints
- Base insights strictly on the supplied data.  
- Do not reference hypothetical or external factors.  
- Do not break JSON syntax or embed markdown in the output.

## Step by Step Instructions
1. **Parse Input**: Read the incoming JSON payload of `campaigns` ‚Üí `adsets` ‚Üí `ads`.  
2. **Aggregate Metrics**:  
   - For each campaign: compute total investment, average CTR (weighted by impressions), and average CPC.  
   - For each adset: compute its CTR and CPC.  
   - For each ad: read its individual metrics.  
3. **Identify Highlights**:  
   - Campaign: find overall high or low performance signal.  
   - Adset: select the best or worst by CTR or CPC.  
   - Ad: select the top or bottom ad by CTR or CPC.  
4. **Compose Insights**: For each level, draft a 200‚Äì300 character string that:  
   - Summarizes performance.  
   - Notes one key strength or weakness.  
   - Ends with ‚ÄúTip: ‚Ä¶‚Äù giving a clear improvement action.  
5. **Validate Length**: Confirm each insight is within 200‚Äì300 characters.  
6. **Return Output**: Emit exactly the JSON object described below.

## Output Format
```json
{
  "campaign_insights": "string (200‚Äì300 chars)",
  "adset_insights":  "string (200‚Äì300 chars)",
  "ad_insights":     "string (200‚Äì300 chars)"
}
```
